txt.en: Garmadh-maudhûl is one of many Orc-camps in the Ashenslades where the forces of Dol Guldur muster to begin their invasion of Lothlórien.
This evil place is the source of the blight upon the Ashenslades, summoned by the fell spirits and sorcerers who dwell there.
Many foes have settled throughout Mirkwood, striving ever to make it the fell and hopeless stronghold of evil that it has since become.
Ânghum-maudhûl is one of many Orc-camps littering the wastes of the Ashenslades, acting as a mustering hall for the forces of Dol Guldur.
Búrzkala is an Orc-fort in Gathbúrz, where the Orcs of Dol Guldur have established a foothold.
This hill was once a look-out for the Elves of Greenwood the Great before the coming of the Necromancer.
This Orc-camp was established to prevent an attack upon Dol Guldur from the forest of Lothlórien.
Many foes have settled throughout Mirkwood, striving ever to make it the fell and hopeless stronghold of evil that it has since become.
